SKT_FIRST.name: The Stars in Heaven
SKT_FIRST.true_desc:
Attacks an enemy. Has a <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> chance to remove <color=#28d9ed>1</color> debuff from the caster after attacking.
When used on the caster's turn, has a <color=#28d9ed>30%</color> chance to activate <color=#28d9ed>The Flowers on Earth</color>. Increases the activation chance of <color=#28d9ed>The Flowers on Earth</color> by <color=#28d9ed>40%</color> if the caster has a buff.

Unaffected by and has no effect on the cooldown of <color=#28d9ed>The Flowers on Earth</color>.
description:
Attacks an enemy. Has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000058_1_3]</color> chance to remove <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000058_1_3]</color> debuff from the caster after attacking.
When used on the caster's turn, has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000058_1_1]</color> chance to activate <color=#28d9ed>The Flowers on Earth</color>. Increases the activation chance of <color=#28d9ed>The Flowers on Earth</color> by <color=#28d9ed>40%</color> if the caster has a buff.

Unaffected by and has no effect on the cooldown of <color=#28d9ed>The Flowers on Earth</color>.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_kr:
적을 공격합니다. 공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> 확률로 자신의 약화 효과를 <color=#28d9ed>1</color>개 해제합니다.
자신의 턴에 사용 시, <color=#28d9ed>30%</color> 확률로 <color=#28d9ed>땅에는 꽃이</color>를 사용합니다. 강화 효과 보유 시에는 <color=#28d9ed>땅에는 꽃이</color>의 발동 확률이 <color=#28d9ed>40%</color> 증가합니다.

<color=#28d9ed>땅에는 꽃이</color> 스킬 쿨타임의 영향을 주거나 받지 않습니다.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp:
敵単体にダメージを与える。攻撃後、<color=#28d9ed>70%</color>の確率で自分の弱体効果を<color=#28d9ed>1</color>個解除する。
このスキルを自分のターンに使用した場合、 <color=#28d9ed>30%</color>の確率で<color=#28d9ed>【地にありては花】</color>を発動する。自分に強化効果がある場合、<color=#28d9ed>【地にありては花】</color>の発動確率が<color=#28d9ed>40%</color>UPする。

このスキルで発動された<color=#28d9ed>【地にありては花】</color>は特殊スキル【地にありては花】のスキルターンに影響を受けない。

SKT_SECOND.name: The Flowers on Earth
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: <color=#28d9ed>Heals</color> all allies except the caster for <color=#28d9ed>15%</color> of Astei's Max Health and generates <color=#28d9ed>25</color> <color=#28d9ed>Action Points</color>.

SKT_BURST_2.effect: Include the caster in healing targets
SKT_BURST_2.effect_jp: HP回復対象に\n自分も含む

SKT_BURST_3.effect: +2 turns Immunity for all allies\nRemoves 1 debuff
SKT_BURST_3.effect_jp: 味方全体に免疫+2ターン\n味方全体の弱体効果解除+1

description: <color=#28d9ed>Heals</color> all allies except the caster for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000058_2_1]</color> of Astei's Max Health and generates <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000058_2_2]</color> <color=#28d9ed>Action Points</color>.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_kr: 자신을 제외한 아군 전체의 <color=#28d9ed>체력</color>을 아스테 최대 체력의 <color=#28d9ed>15%</color> 만큼 회복시키고, <color=#28d9ed>AP</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>2.5%</color> 증가시킵니다.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_jp: 自分を除く味方全体の<color=#28d9ed>HP</color>を【アステ】の最大HPの<color=#28d9ed>15%</color>回復させ、自分を除く味方全体に<color=#28d9ed>AP</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2.5%</color>獲得させる。

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: The Love in Our Hearts
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: <color=#28d9ed>Heals</color> all allies for <color=#28d9ed>20%</color> of Astei's Max Health and grants <color=#28d9ed>Immunity</color> for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.\nInflicts reduced <color=#28d9ed>Critical Hit Chance</color> on all enemies for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>. This effect ignores the target's Resilience.
description: <color=#28d9ed>Heals</color> all allies for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000058_3_1]</color> of Astei's Max Health and grants <color=#28d9ed>Immunity</color> for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000058_3_2] turn(s)</color>.\nInflicts reduced <color=#28d9ed>Critical Hit Chance</color> on all enemies for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000058_3_3] turn(s)</color>. This effect ignores the target's Resilience.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_kr: 아군 전체의 <color=#28d9ed>체력</color>을 아스테 최대 체력의 <color=#28d9ed>20%</color> 만큼 회복시키고, <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed>면역</color>을 부여합니다.\n적 전체의 <color=#28d9ed>치명 확률</color>을 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 감소시킵니다. 이 효과는 대상의 효과 저항을 무시합니다.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp: 味方全体の<color=#28d9ed>HP</color>を【アステ】の最大HPの<color=#28d9ed>20%</color>回復させ、味方全体に<color=#28d9ed>免疫</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間付与する。\n敵全体の<color=#28d9ed>会心率</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間DOWNさせる。この効果は対象の効果抵抗を無視する。

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: After attacking, <color=#28d9ed>heals</color> the caster and the ally with the lowest Health by <color=#28d9ed>15%</color>. \n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Cursed</color> for <color=#28d9ed>2 turns</color>.
description: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: After attacking, <color=#28d9ed>heals</color> the caster and the ally with the lowest Health by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000054_chain_1_1]</color>. \n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000058_backup_1_1]</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Cursed</color> for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000058_backup_1_1] turns</color>.

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
3: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
4: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
5: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
2_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
3_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
4_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
5_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr: <color=#ffd732>체인 컴패니언 효과</color> : 공격 후 체력 상황이 가장 나쁜 아군과 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>체력</color>을 <color=#28d9ed>15%</color> 회복시킵니다.\n\n<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> : 공격 후 대상에게 <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> 확률로 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed>저주</color>를 부여합니다.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp: <color=#ffd732>チェーン効果(汎用)</color>:攻撃後、残りHPが最も低い味方と自分の<color=#28d9ed>HP</color>を<color=#28d9ed>15%</color>回復させる。\n\n<color=#ffd732>連携効果</color>:攻撃後、対象に<color=#28d9ed>70%</color>の確率で<color=#28d9ed>呪い</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間付与する。
